title: CSS
subTitle: This is a subtitle
overviewContent: My proficiency in CSS enables me to design responsive, mobile-first websites with consistency across devices and platforms. I have successfully implemented front-end designs that are user-friendly and optimised for performance. By working with frameworks such as Bootstrap and applying advanced CSS techniques like flexbox and grid, I ensure that user interfaces are both functional and visually consistent. This work often involves close collaboration with designers and front-end developers to maintain the highest standards of user experience.
